content.html:
This improves it, but I still see failures sometimes.

diff -r 2ff9d8f95860 test/integration/world_open.cc
--- a/test/integration/world_open.cc    Thu Jan 28 15:32:10 2016 -0800
+++ b/test/integration/world_open.cc    Fri Jan 29 00:12:10 2016 -0800
@@ -179,6 +179,7 @@
     // Get the new world
     world = physics::get_world("default");
     ASSERT_TRUE(world != NULL);
+    world->Step(100);

     // Check models
     size_t count = 0;
